cards.name: Convert
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Choose (Change) a (the) card. (type) Change (of) its (All) type (cards)  (in your hand ) to Attack this combat.

cards.name: Forge
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Upgrade a card in your hand 2 (3) times.

cards.name: Perfected Defend
cards.description:
This card counts as a Strike.
Gain 5 Block.
Gains 2 (3) additional block for each Strike card you have.

cards.name: Sharpened Edge
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Deals 2 (3) additional damage for each other Attack card in your hand.

cards.name: Shield Clash
cards.description:
Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack.
Gain 14 (18) Block.

cards.name: Weapon Stand
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Upgrade any Attack cards drawn this way for this combat.

cards.name: Adapt
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, add the Strike tag to it.

cards.name: Dedication
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) Strength.
Add 2 Bleedings to your hand.

cards.name: Deprecate
cards.description: Change the type of the top 3 (5) cards of your draw pile to Status and upgrade them this combat.

cards.name: Fitness
cards.description: Whenever you draw a Status card, gain 3 (5) temporary Strength.

cards.name: Flame Aura
cards.description:
Whenever you lose HP from a card, deal 6 (9) damage to all enemies.
Damage calculated as Attack.

cards.name: Improvise
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, change its type to Attack this combat.

cards.name: Molten Shield
cards.description: Whenever you draw a Status card, gain 3 (4) Block.

cards.name: Patience
cards.description:
Can only be played if all cards in your hand are Attack cards.
Draw 2 (3) cards.

cards.name: Recover
cards.description:
Heal 3 (4) HP for each time you have lost HP from cards this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sharpen
cards.description:
(Draw 1 card.)
If you have 3 or more Attack cards in your hand, gain 3 Strength.

cards.name: Step Up
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Add 1 Bleeding to your hand.

cards.name: Target Practice
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the start of your turn, add the Strike tag to a random card in your hand.

cards.name: Unleash
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
If it is a Status card, gain [R] and repeat this effect.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Arsenal
cards.description:
Add 5  (upgraded ) Clashes to the top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cache
cards.description:
Draw cards until you draw one that isn't an Attack card.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: End of the Road
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 3 (4) times the amount of Status cards you have to all enemies.

cards.name: Extract Potential
cards.description:
Deal 18 (22) damage.
If this does not end the combat, permanently add an upgraded Status card to your deck.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Melt
cards.description:
If you have an upgraded Status card in your hand, permanently add a Clash (+) to your deck.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overcome
cards.description: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, gain [R] .

cards.name: Perfected Clash
cards.description:
Can only be played if every card in your hand is an attack.
Deal 14 damage.
Deals 5 (7) additional damage for each Clash you have.

cards.name: Reincarnate
cards.description:
Exhaust your exhaust pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rewound
cards.description:
Shuffle one of each upgraded Status cards into your draw pile.
Draw 4 (6) cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Second Eye
cards.description:
Look at your draw pile.
Change the type of any number of cards to Skill this combat.

cards.name: Smith
cards.description:
Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand.
Add a Clash (+) to your hand for each card Exhausted.

cards.name: Bleeding
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, lose 1 (2) HP.
